author: Teortaxes (DeepSeek 推特铁粉 2023 – ∞) @teortaxesTex
text:
I think GPT-5.2 is a minor toposophic step, like Sonnet 3.5.
not hype. This will likely be commoditized in weeks-months again. What I mean practically is that I can’t hope to get the *peak insight* of this model from any other with reasonable budget.
It’s refreshing.
